parameters.name: AdviceType
parameters.description:
The type of the suggestion. Valid values:

*   **INDEX**: index optimization.
*   **TIERING**: hot and cold data optimization.

parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~129857~~) operation to query the IDs of AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition clusters within a region.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyyMMdd format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to query information by table name.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The display language of the suggestion. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): simplified Chinese.
*   **en**: English.
*   **ja**: Japanese.
*   **zh-tw**: traditional Chinese.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order by which to sort query results. Specify the parameter value in the JSON format. Example: `[{"Field":"SchemaName","Type":"Asc"}]`.

*   `Field` specifies the field by which to sort the query results. Valid values:

    *   `SchemaName`: the name of the database.
    *   `TableName`: the name of the table.
    *   `JobStatus`: the status of the BUILD job that is triggered on the table.
    *   `SubmitTime`: the time when the suggestion was submitted.
    *   `Benefit`: the expected benefits of the applied optimization suggestion.

*   `Type` specifies the sorting order. Valid values:

    *   `Asc`: ascending order.
    *   `Desc`: descending order.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, optimization suggestions are sorted in descending order based on the submission time.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30** (default)
*   **50**
*   **100**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: SchemaTableName
parameters.description: The name of the table in the **DatabaseName.TableName** format.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyyMMdd format. The time must be in UTC.
